data.text: @AbcCollab @DukeHealth @AmerAcadPeds Any studies about outcomes for folks crammed into small enclosed spaces where some remove masks to eat and drink? This study would be easy to conduct, as subjects under these conditions can be found waiting for family members having procedures in your hospital.

@AbcCollab @AmerAcadPeds You compare 6 districts with no mask and 46 districts with mask mandates. Really?  Is there a link to the raw data? Duke no longer can be assumed to conduct good science based on the biased manipulated ‘studies’ released so far. These findings do not match up with other studies.
@AbcCollab @AmerAcadPeds you people aren't serious scientists at all are you? 🤡
@AbcCollab @AmerAcadPeds https://t.co/qZb5sS3lUL And still mandating boosters for healthy covid-recovered students. Bless their hearts.
@AbcCollab @AmerAcadPeds Why don’t you report testing rates? https://t.co/a0TfvbdPb1

@AbcCollab @AmerAcadPeds Where is the DATA from your study??

Your links do not include any information, or show any proof of your conclusion.
You literally just wrote “we found that mask optional had more cases” 🤪

SHOW YOUR WORK
